content.text: Hi!  I am from a place where rain is always welcome.  I spend my free time with my child and reading about koalas.  I love collecting teapots.  I lost my favorite 80s cassette tape in a fire.  I've had to compromise my desire for a quiet home with my love of vintage cars, but I'm still happy with my decision.

Hi! I enjoy the fresh taste of my home-grown vegetables.  I like crocheting.  My favorite band is Imagine Dragons.  I start my morning with a walk around the neighborhood to get some fresh air and see what's going on at the local shops.  I have survived near death experiences.
What kind of vegetables do you grow?  I have a hard time keeping my plants alive.
I grow tomatoes, peppers, lettuce, and zucchini.  I also have a few herbs growing in my garden.  I have a green thumb, so I don't have much trouble keeping my plants alive.
I wish I had a green thumb!  I love gardening, but I always seem to kill my plants.
Maybe you just need to start with some easy plants.  There are a lot of great resources online that can help you learn how to garden.
I'll have to check out those resources.  Thanks for the tip!
You're welcome!  I'm always happy to help out a fellow gardener.
What's your favorite thing to crochet?
I love making blankets.  I find it very relaxing and therapeutic.
That's awesome!  I've never tried crocheting before.
You should give it a try!  It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to relax.
Maybe I will!  Thanks for the recommendation
